mapper.select: SELECT pro_id, sku_cd, brd_id, man_id, name, model, description, sts_cd FROM product WHERE brd_id=#{brdId}
SELECT p.pro_id, name, pc.category_name FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.pro_id = pc.pro_id WHERE p.brd_id=#{brdId}

SELECT p.pro_id, p.NAME, p.sku_cd, p.model, p.description, p.warranty_day, p.warranty, pac.width, pac.height, pac.weight, pac.length, p.retail_price, p.min_retail_price, p.replenishment_period, p.image_url, pc.category_name FROM product p JOIN package_info pac ON p.pro_id = pac.pro_id JOIN product_category pc ON p.pro_id = pc.pro_id WHERE p.pro_id=#{proId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (brd_id, man_id, sku_cd, name, model, description, warranty_day, retail_price, min_retail_price, sts_cd, replenishment_period, warranty, create_date, last_update_date) VALUES (#{brdId}, #{manId}, #{skuCd}, #{name}, #{model}, #{description}, #{warrantyDay}, #{retailPrice}, #{minRetailPrice}, "0", #{replenishmentPeriod}, #{warranty}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT pro_id, name, retail_price, min_retail_price, image_url FROM product WHERE sts_cd =1
